title: Bolsonaro shrugs off criticism he is 'genocidal' as Brazil reports record 4,000 daily deaths
content:
1. Bolsonaro shrugs off criticism he is 'genocidal' as Brazil reports record 4,000 daily deaths  CNN
  2. 'A biological Fukushima': Brazil COVID-19 deaths on track to pass worst of U.S. wave  Reuters
  3. Brazil COVID-19 Update: Mutant virus wreaks havoc, 4195 people died in 24 hrs| Coronavirus Pandemic  WION
  4. Global COVID-19 death toll surpasses 3 million amid new infections resurgence  KSL.com
  5. Brazil's COVID-19 death surge set to pass the worst of record U.S. wave  Yahoo News

localize.title: ボルソナロ氏、「大量虐殺」との批判を一蹴！ブラジルでは1日の死者数が4000人を記録
博尔索纳罗推卸他是 "种族灭绝 "的批评，巴西报告日死亡人数达到创纪录的4,000人
博爾索納羅推卸他是 "種族滅絕 "的批評，巴西報告日死亡人數達到創紀錄的4,000人
